plot: Galen ventures through life and continuously stumbles upon awkward situations, most often due to his own awkward behavior. As time moves on, he realizes that changes are necessary in order to be completely happy.
plot_en: Galen ventures through life and continuously stumbles upon awkward situations, most often due to his own awkward behavior. As time moves on, he realizes that changes are necessary in order to be completely happy.
plot_es: Galen ventures through life and continuously stumbles upon awkward situations, most often due to his own awkward behavior. As time moves on, he realizes that changes are necessary in order to be completely happy.
title: Galen
